name: Dirty Phrases: adult party game + taboo words
name_original: Dirty Phrases: adult party game + taboo words
description:
Censored is the naughty, dirty word and phrase guessing, adult party game you’ll have fun playing with your friends anywhere (drinking, pub, bar, pregame, road trip, party, etc...)!!

It’s simple and super fun. Get your friends (or roommates or relatives) to guess as many dirty adult themed secret phrases as possible in 90 seconds but no one (not you, not your friends) is allowed to say the taboo words (if you catch them guess one, give them a heads up they are wrong by buzzing them with the buzzer)!

Features:
- PARTY GAME - Turn everyday hanging out with friends (chilling, pregame before drinking at a bar or pub, on a road trip in a car, when you are bored, etc...) into a naughty hysterical fun time!
- 2+ PLAYERS - You can play heads up against just one friend (or roommate) or as large group guessing game with everyone trying to guess the phrase
- ADULT THEMED - This dirty adult party game is not child appropriate, it's filled to the brim with hilariously dirty words and phrases for you to guess, most of which are so naughty we can’t include them in this description….
- WORD GUESSING - In the same genre as heads up, taboo, charades or catch phrase but with an added twist that *no one*, not even the guesser, can say the censored words or phrases while trying to guess the secret word
- PLAY ANYTIME - It’s quick to play at 90 second rounds and always with you, so no need to give your friends heads up or advance notice. You can play as a roadtripper while in the car on a road trip, as a pregame before a night out, as a drinking game at a bar or pub, as a party game or filler game on game night or anywhere else (as long as it's only adults)!
- AWESOME BUZZER - When your catch your friends messing up and guessing a taboo word you give them a heads up by buzzing the outrageous buzzer

Download now to supercharge the next time you are hanging out with a group of friends with "Censored: adult party game + dirty phrase guessing" for a hilariously dirty time!

----

IMPORTANT NOTE: Heads up, this game is dirty, naughty, spicy and meant only for adults. It is filled to the brim with alcohol (drinking, bar, pub, etc...) related words + phrases, sex related words + phrases, naughty (swear, dirty, bad, cuss, curse, etc...) related words + phrases that many people will find taboo. It is not appropriate for children or a young family, please only install if you are comfortable with that and don't say we didn't give you a heads up!
